author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Directorate of Vigilance and Anti-Corruption police arrested a Revenue Inspector here on Saturday while accepting bribe for issuing a legal heir certificate to a farmer.

According to the police, the RI, Ravichandran of Dindigul, insisted on a bribe of Rs. 6,000 for issuing a legal heir certificate to R. Murugesan, a farmer of Kappiliyampatti.

The police said that Murugesan had approached the RI twice for the certificate after going through due process of verification from the level of the VAO. A team of DVAC personnel caught the RI on Saturday while he was taking the bribe from Murugesan.
title: RI held on graft charge
